name: Malicious Rebirth
description:
Inhabit the mysterious Spirit Vessel and get ready to brawl as stylish PlayStation®3 hit Malicious is reborn on the PS Vita system with brand new features. Enjoy short bursts of boss-battling action in a sumptuous fantasy world, and tackle “Rebirth”, an entire sequel episode complete with colossal new enemies.Features- Enjoy the signature combat of Malicious – now on the PS Vita system, complete with an action-packed new chapter.- Battle waves of brutal minions before facing the Keepers of the Power – giant opponents who stand between you and Malicious, the evil force that brings disaster to the world.- Perform combos and link special moves to form chains as you build the Spirit Vessel’s aura to unleash even more devastating attacks. - Fight your way through each level to enhance the Spirit Vessel and receive the weapons and abilities required for the final showdown between good and evil.

Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.

1 player(s)
100KB Minimum
